Description: Set gpio_num for use by RDSTAT. Note: SETGPIO, CLRGPIO, TOGGPIO and SETINT set gpio_num

Read the mode control for GPIO[gpio_num] (set gpio_num using SETSEL). 0x0: Input only (output is tri-stated). 0x1: Output active. 0x2: Open drain (value=0 drives 0, when value=1 tristated). 0x3: Open drain (value=0 drives 0, when value=1 tristated).

Type of interrupt for GPIO[gpio_num]. 0x0: active low, level type interrupt. 0x1: rising edge type interupt. 0x2: falling edge type interrupt. 0x3: no interrupt. 0x4: active high, level type interrupt. 0x5 to 0x7: no interrupt
Output value that is set on GPIO[gpio_num]

mode control for GPIO[gpio_num}. 0x0: Input only (output is tri-stated). 0x1: Output active. 0x2: Open drain (value=0 drives 0, when value=1 tristated). 0x3: Open drain (value=0 drives 0, when value=1 tristated)
Address of GPIO to set mode for

Type of interrupt for GPIO[gpio_num]. 0x0: active low, level type interrupt. 0x1: rising edge type interupt. 0x2: falling edge type interrupt. 0x3: no interrupt. 0x4: active high, level type interrupt. 0x5 to 0x7: no interrupt.
Address of GPIO to set interrupt type and enable for
